item.title: Random Vault -- Pwn2Win 2019 CTF
item.description: With Jorge Points: 303 (dynamic) Solves: 18 TL;DR Only two Format String vulnerability allowed. Use first Format String to bypass PIE mitigation Use second Format String to: change srand() seed value change function pointer Built shellcode and get shell Reversing Binary Mitigations Arch: amd64-64-little RELRO: FULL RELRO STACK: Canary Found NX: NX enabled PIE: PIE enabled The binary functionality is pretty simple: 1. Change username Let’s you change the username once, will lead to printf(username).
